𓈐 path путь putʹ путь putĭ пѫть pǫtĭ ⱂⱘⱅⱐ pǫtĭ pod 𓃀 𓂾

𒉺𒁕𒉡 pa-da-nu pathing “path, way”

𒌨𒄷 𒉺𒁕𒉡 urᵗhu pa-da-nu "straight road pathing"

𒄊 GIR3 ĝiri3 𓌨 𓂋 •care, via, by means of, under the authority; foot; path

𒄯 ḪAR •qur in 𒄯𒊏𒀭 har-ra-an harran •quran "route, passage; path"

𒂍𒁽;𒂍𒆜;𒂍𒁽𒈨;𒂍𒁽𒂠;𒂍𒁽𒋫 port𒆜casa-calla 𒂍≈𓉔 road "path"-house
